titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 111: Novellae on Talmud Shevuʹot 12a-14b

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesStmt.note: Article endings denoted by a punctus plus varying spacings; Fol. 1 (missing about 4 lines from the top) starts near the beginning of the article on Shavuot 12a אמר רב שמאול , to the article on 12b מתני'- ועל שאר, parallel to, in the published edition (Ḥidushe ha-Ri Migash ʻal maseḳhet Shevuʹot. Jerusalem, 1955) p. 16b l. 35 כל שעירי - 17b l. 11 דלא עבד); After a lost bifolium, fol. 2 (lacking 5-17 lines from the top) resumes at the end of the article on 14a והאי דקתני and ends in the article on 14b בעי ר' ירמיה (op. cit. 20b l. 32 דמשתלי to 21b l. 8 מפורשת); There are Genizah fragments of at least three other copies of this work, A) Cambridge T-S AS 95.210; B) AS 95.50 + AS 93.164; AS 93.90; C) T-S F5.110+F3.68.
Condition: non-consecutive; losses at top; fol. 2 torn diagonally, lacking most of upper exterior corner.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

msItem.title: Novellae on Talmud Shevuʹot 12a-14b
msItem.author: Ibn Migash, Joseph ben Meir, ha-Levi, 1077-1141 אבן מיגש, יוסף בן מאיר, הלוי Ibn Migash, Joseph ben Meir ha-Levi Yosef ha-Lewi ʾIben Migaš, 1077-1141 Josef ibn Migasch spanischer Rabbiner Ibn Migash, Yosef ben Meʾir ha-Leṿi 1077-1141

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 22 extant (of estimated 26); ruling method: left rule occasionally filled with two hyphens.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
